review: Its alright. Not many free apps though. Only downside is that you have to pay for most of the apps.
author: Michael Tran

review: The remote is the best part of this product. It does not have icon for Amazon prime video. Would not purchase again. Buy Roku instead.
author: NF

review: COULD NOT USE WITH MY TV  DID NOT HAVE  NECESSARY PLUG IN ON TV. ONLY ONE AND IT WAS USED WITH DISH RECEIVER WAS PLUGGED INTO IT.
author: ted w. barber

review: Bought it for the office television. Easy to install. Worked immediately. Most people have iPads/iPhones to connect easily through Airplay.
author: Susan Lay

review: Good price and arrived on time
author: John M

review: up rate solf ware it vork good.
author: david63

review: I have one myself and use it for it's streaming services.  Just purchased another one for my parents for Christmas.  They didn't really know what it was but now that they have Netflix I get regular updates about what's being watched.  Very happy with the ease of use and variety of features.
author: B. Myers "BLMYERS"

review: Cutting off when in Airplay mode. Glitches when airplaying youtube(through youtube app) and other video sites. Slow when starting Airplay on Mac. Resetting the devices may solve issues, however for short periods. Good product though that needs improvements.
author: Vladimir Ghahramanyan
